CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF H. BARTOW FARR ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFF
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE DEFENDANT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF H. BARTOW FARR ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFF
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
